name: py-pygetwindow

variants.name: build_system

description:
A simple, cross-platform module for obtaining GUI information on and
controlling application's windows.

dependencies.name: py-pyrect

PyRect is a simple module with a Rect class for Pygame-like rectangular
areas.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-pyautogui
dependent_to.description:
PyAutoGUI lets your Python scripts control the mouse and keyboard to
automate interactions with other applications.
